channel.title: Getting my server online
channel.description:
can someone please help me get my server online. Maybe someone who has experience with putting servers online for others to play.
well i have portforward and know how to make a webclient the thing is making it online for others to play. i have set the ip to my home ip and people cant connect. i set the ip to no ip and noone can connect so i have no idea what to do!

item.title: Getting my server online
item.dc:creator: @ppvagina ppvagina
item.description:
@ppvagina wrote:

i did my portforward like it told me to do on portfoward.com
but if anyone reading this has a actiontec pk5000 and knows how to portforward pls help me out

Read full topic

item.title: Getting my server online
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

maybe you didn’t portforward right? do you have ATT&T Modem? maybe I could help you and check your message box.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting my server online
item.dc:creator: @ppvagina ppvagina
item.description:
@ppvagina wrote:

Umm well I’m not home right now but that is most likely what it is. because i can play at my house but my cousin can’t play at his is it because my firewall wont let him? or is it because i did something wrong.

Read full topic

did you turn your firewall off or make a firewall exception
